Sentencas: Electrical and structural properties of bismuth oxide doped scandia- stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) electrolyte for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have been evaluated by means of XRD, TGA, DTA, and impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The amount of Bi2O3 in the ScSZ was varied in the range of 0.25-2.0 mol%.
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The original ScSZ samples indicated a rhombohedral crystalline structure that in general has lower conductivity than the cubic phase.
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: However, the addition of Bi2O3 to ScSZ electrolyte was found to stabilize the cubic crystalline phase as detected by XRD.
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Impedance spectroscopy measurements in the temperature range between 350 and 900 degrees C indicated a sharp increase in conductivity for the system containing 2 mol% of Bi2O3 that is attributed to the presence of the cubic phase.
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, impedance spectroscopy measurements revealed significant decrease of both the grain bulk and grain boundary resistances with respect to the temperature change from 600 to 900 degrees C and concentration of Bi2O3 from 0.5 to 2 mol%.
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity at 600 degrees C obtained for 2 mol% Bi2O3 doped ScSZ was 0.18 S cm(-1).
Titulo: Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
Bismuth oxide doped scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte for the intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells
